SEARCH
Package gutek.gui.controllers

Class FXMLController

java.lang.Object
gutek.gui.controllers.FXMLController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthorsFXMLController, CardCellFXMLController, DeckCellFXMLController, DecksFXMLController, LanguageSelectionFXMLController, LoginFXMLController, MenuBarFXMLController, MenuDeckFXMLController, NewDeckFXMLController, RevisionAddCardFXMLController, RevisionEditCardFXMLController, RevisionFXMLController, RevisionRegularFXMLController, RevisionReverseFXMLController, RevisionSearchFXMLController, RevisionSettingsFXMLController, RevisionStatisticsFXMLController, TrashDeckCellFXMLController, TrashFXMLController
public abstract class FXMLController extends Object
The `FXMLController` class serves as an abstract base class for all FXML controllers in the application. It provides common methods for updating translations, resizing, and refreshing views, which can be inherited by specific view controllers.

  • Constructor Details

    • FXMLController

      protected FXMLController(MainStage stage, FXMLFileLoader fxmlFileLoader, String fxmlFilePath, TranslationService translationService)
      Constructs a new `AppFXMLController` object with the specified dependencies.
      Parameters:
      stage - the main application stage where the scene is displayed
      fxmlFileLoader - utility for loading the FXML file associated with this scene
      fxmlFilePath - the path to the FXML file for this scene
      translationService - the service responsible for handling translations within this scene

  • Method Details

    • updateTranslation

      public void updateTranslation()
      Updates the translations of the current scene. Expected to be overridden by subclasses to handle translations of specific components.

    • updateSize

      public void updateSize()
      Updates the size of components in the current scene. Expected to be overridden by subclasses to handle resizing of specific components.

    • updateView

      public void updateView()
      Updates the contents of the current scene. Subclasses can override this method to refresh or reload specific data or UI elements.

    • loadViewFromFXML

      public void loadViewFromFXML()
      Loads the view from the specified FXML file if it has not been loaded already.

    • initWithParams

      public void initWithParams(Object... params)
      Initializes the controller with optional parameters. Subclasses can override this to initialize specific data or context.
      Parameters:
      params - optional parameters to initialize the controller
